articles.author: Liv Klingert
articles.title: Olympic chiefs reject call for EU flag at Tokyo opening ceremony - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: European Union had proposed making Slovenian athletes ‘ambassadors’ for bloc.
articles.content:
Team EU may deserve a gold medal for trying its luck but Olympic chiefs have rejected a request to feature the European Union flag at the opening ceremony of the Tokyo games.
